content.value: Baizhi is a researcher in Remnant Ecoacoustics. Baizhi's once unfulfilled wish has now manifested as her loyal companion. The Remnant Creature You'tan is her source of healing powers, and a lifelong research focus.

review.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Baizhi is a 4-star free to play Glacio Rectifier wielder Support that brings a wide array of buffs and healing utilities for her teammates, making her an indispensable member regardless of your team composition. However, her buffs are focused on ST, increasing her utility in solo DPS teams over the rest.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Her Forte Gauge can accumulate up to 4 charges, with every Basic Attack performed recharging 1. Everytime she uses her Resonance Skill or Heavy Attack, she consumes all the accumulated stacks, enhancing the skill to increase healing provided as well as generating far more Concerto Energy than normal. As such, her Forte’s main utility is maximizing her Concerto Energy gains which is the heart of her kit.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Her Resonance Skill calls her companion You’tan back to her, which pulses Glacio damage around herself after a short delay while simultaneously healing all her team. This also generates a good amount of Concerto Energy.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Her Ultimate Skill generates a lot of Concerto Energy while healing her whole team. It also grants the Remnant Entities buff, which launches an attack every 2.5 seconds up to 4 times, dealing Glacio Damage on hit while healing the active party member.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Contrary to other Supporters such as Verina, Baizhi requires more field time in order to utilize her properly, but not enough to cause an issue with team compositions. She brings a plethora of ST specialized buffs, causing significant gains in DPS, along with her solid healing which can turn the tides of battle.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Baizhi has a fairly easy to master playstyle, only requiring a handful of Basic Attacks and her Resonance Skill. However, she can feel sluggish due to her companion performing all her attacks, which causes slight but noticeable delays when calling it back and forth.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"In addition to her healing capabilities, Baizhi brings a 15% Generic Damage amplification from her Outro Skill, which affects the next character switching in and lingers even after switching characters - an extremely rare trait among various Outro amplifications present in the game. Furthermore, she grants a 15% ATK boost after using her Resonance Skill, which spawns a bubble on the floor which can be gathered by a single character you wish for to receive this buff. Adding Echo & sets to the mix, she prefers a combination of Bell-Borne Geochelone Echo & 5P Rejuvenating Glow set which allows her to grant a semi-permanent ATK% boost, temporary DMG% boost and protection from a set number of attacks. In the instance another character is using the above set, she can make use of the 5P Moonlit Glow and Impermanence Heron Echo combo instead.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Overall, while many of Baizhi’s buffs are singular in nature she’s still currently one of the best Supports for Tower of Adversary, all thanks to her great bonuses and healing capabilities. While you can find her in top tier teams, she is primarily utilized when superior alternatives such as Verina are already used or missing from the account, the reason she falls behind the mighty Verina is because Baizhi does everything Verina does, but worse and is restricted to Single Target only, making Verina a directly superior choice.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

pros.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Incredible supportive Outro, granting 15% DMG Amplification which is not lost when switching","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can effortlessly enable the 5P Healer set bonus without sacrificing her weapon choice","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Completely universal - every single team can use Baizhi","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Has decent team-wide healing","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Can grant the team a cheat-death after unlocking S5 in the form of a full heal to the character that would have suffered fatal damage","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

cons.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Is in direct competition with the very similar but superior in every way character Verina. Currently there is enough room for both in the endgame meta though","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Most attacks have a slight delay when used due to her pet performing them ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

echo_sets.name: Rejuvenating Glow
echo_sets.notes: Offers a 10% unconditional Healing% boost and most importantly a 15% ATK% boost for the entire team, lasting 30 seconds whenever you heal yourself or any of your allies. This bonus can be triggered by the character abilities and weapon effects, is easy to keep active 100% of the time, and is a big help for all party members.

buildInfoOther.substats: Energy Regeneration (Until Breakpoint) > HP% > Flat HP
